item.title: Text Arch
item.description: Text To Arch Script With Excalidraw On Obsidian First we need to install excalidraw on obsidian. This is the link for Excalidraw GitHub and it will show quite a bit of info, but you will want to install it from community plugins page in setting and you will have to turn on restricted mode. In the top right button that looks like settings icon click that and it will bring up all the scripts available to install, the text arch script was close to the bottom of the page.

item.title: How I am evolving since I learned linux
item.description: I started my computer crash course during the start of the covid lockdowns with a Raspberry Pi 4b. Being self-taught it was the best way to start since I had no previous experience with computers and the cost of failure was low. Since then I have mastered turning a server into a fully customized desktop using Qtile as my window manager and this took some time to get used to, but well worth the effort if you like the speed of transitioning from project to project.

item.title: Strategies on Fusion
item.description: Strategies On Fusion Nova Network Is a different kind of protocol , no crazy APY or APR, built for long term success #GrownUpDeFi. So with this in mind this is a long term hold and commitment on some of these ideas, If you believe in the success of Nova Network. DYOR They have great docs and offer a lot of help if you want to build with them, check out their GitHub

item.title: Tools for Research
item.description: Wallet Tracking DeBank you put your wallet address here to see your investments.This is not small block-chain friendly.If you use this correctly you can enter other wallet addresses and see what they are investing in. Nansen Portfolio this is probably the best wallet tracker, also gives analytics of the tokens that you hold. Tin.Network, I only use this to track wallets on Harmony ONE. Defi Dashboard Nanoly this is good for searching farms with good APY’s or APR Defillama is a overview of all of DEFI Trading View DEX Screener search most popular #EVM chain and their coins and they have been adding #IBC chains as well of lately.
